comment.author: 30085166@N00
comment._content: This is probably Leland Stanford Scott, a Stanford University senior when he set a world record in the pole vault at a college meet between Stanford and Colorado, which took place in Boulder on May 27, 1910 (the third and fourth listings, a couple of scrolls down from the top on this web page.) I've been unable to discover if Scott was related to University founder Leland Stanford, or was just named after him.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
whyaduck:

Thanks for the information!  It seems likely this is the same man. We'll expand the descriptive data and reload it to Flickr.

comment._content: Anyone know why he's wearing two different shoes? Something to do with pole vaulting?
